name: EmmanuelCovenantChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Emmanuel Covenant”
”Alexa, ask Emmanuel Covenant for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Emmanuel Covenant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: emmanuel covenant
des: Listen to the latest messages from Emmanuel Covenant Church in Shoreview, MN. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Learn more about Emmanuel on our website, www.emmanuel.church, or visit us on Sunday mornings at the Shoreview Community Center.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
